title: Fortnite's Harry Potter Collab Revealed, Lets You Dress Up Like A Wizard
description:
Epic Games has announced the latest major collab in Fortnite, and it's Harry Potter. Warner Bros. Interactive Entertainment and Epic are bringing "the world of Harry Potter" to Epic's platform this month, including Fortnite and Rocket League.
The Fortnite Shop will be updated later this month with outfits and accessories based on all things Harry Potter and the wider wizarding world. The outfits can be tailored to specific houses, including Gryffindor, Slytherin, Ravenclaw, and Hufflepuff.

title: EA's $55 Billion Sale Price Reflects Gaming's "Place In Modern Entertainment," Xbox Boss Says
description:
One of the biggest pieces of news in gaming this year was EA's announcement that it was selling itself for $55 billion to investors including Saudi Arabia. The announcement of the deal has sent shockwaves through the gaming world, and now Head of Xbox Game Studios Matt Booty has commented on the deal, saying the price tag reflects how big video games have come in the global media landscape.
"Games have really become a foundational part of entertainment," Booty told Variety. "And as such, I think we're seeing these valuations and transactions that really reflect their place in modern entertainment."
The price of the sale "reflects the value that exists in all of" the gaming IP that EA owns, including Madden, FC, and The Sims, Booty said.

title: Netflix, Warner, Paramount and antitrust: Entertainment megadeal’s outcome must follow the evidence, not politics or fear of integration
description: Even President Trump is concerned about this situation. But the answers aren’t obvious.

title: ‘We’re not just going to want to be fed AI slop for 16 hours a day’: Analyst sees Disney/OpenAI deal as a dividing line in entertainment history
description: "​I think the reason this bidding is approaching $100 billion-plus is the content library and the potential to do a Disney-OpenAI type of deal."
